member.name: T:HapFACS.HapFACSEmotion
member.author: Reza Amini (ramin001@fiu.edu) Affective Social Computing lab at Florida International University
member.summary: HapFACSEmotion object simulates the Emotional FACS (EmFACS) emotions

member.name: M:HapFACS.HapFACSEmotion.Happiness(System.String,System.String)
member.author: Reza Amini (ramin001@fiu.edu) Affective Social Computing lab at Florida International University
member.summary: Maps EmFACS happiness on the Haptek face with the specified intensity. Highest level of happiness is the combination of AU6B, AU12E, and AU25B.
member.param: Intensity of happiness
Previous intensity of happiness
member.returns: Hypertext to map happiness on the Haptek face

member.name: M:HapFACS.HapFACSEmotion.Sadness(System.String,System.String)
member.author: Reza Amini (ramin001@fiu.edu) Affective Social Computing lab at Florida International University
member.summary: Maps EmFACS sadness on the Haptek face with the specified intensity. Highest level of sadness is the combination of AU1E, AU4E, and AU15E.
member.param: Intensity of sadness
Previous intensity of sadness
member.returns: Hypertext to map sadness on the Haptek face

member.name: M:HapFACS.HapFACSEmotion.Surprise(System.String,System.String)
member.author: Reza Amini (ramin001@fiu.edu) Affective Social Computing lab at Florida International University
member.summary: Maps EmFACS surprise on the Haptek face with the specified intensity. Highest level of surprise is the combination of AU1E, AU2E, AU5B, and AU26E.
member.param: Intensity of surprise
Previous intensity of surprise
member.returns: Hypertext to map surprise on the Haptek face

member.name: M:HapFACS.HapFACSEmotion.Fear(System.String,System.String)
member.author: Reza Amini (ramin001@fiu.edu) Affective Social Computing lab at Florida International University

Previous intensity of fear
member.returns: Hypertext to map fear on the Haptek face
